rooms.name: Main Entrance & Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious living room with an integrated foyer to welcome guests. Decorated in neutral tones aligned with Vastu recommendations for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living area, ensuring a harmonious space with open sightlines; designed in line with Indian design aesthetics and Vastu principles of dining direction.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Located towards the east for maximum exposure to morning sunlight, adhering to Vastu guidelines. Features an ensuite bathroom and walk-in closet.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Placed in a quiet corner of the ground floor for privacy, ensuring ease of access yet maintaining tranquility as per Vastu.

rooms.name: Kids' Bedroom
rooms.description: Co-located with recreational space to encourage play and study. Designed with safety in mind for a family of four.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A dedicated quiet zone, positioned near natural light but away from high-traffic areas to ensure concentration and calm per Vastu recommendations.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: An enclosed area designed with proper ventilation and ample space for various exercises. Placed in a location that avoids disturbance to the rest of the family.

rooms.name: Kitchen & Utility Area
rooms.description: Functional layout aligning with Vastu principles for food preparation; strategically placed away from bedrooms but accessible from dining and living areas.

rooms.name: Study/Workroom
rooms.description: A quiet space designed for work or study, ensuring minimal distractions while still being centrally located on the ground floor.

openings.name: Front Door
openings.description: Main entry point designed in accordance with Vastu to invite positive energy. Surrounded by a small verandah to ease the transition from outside.

openings.name: Balcony/Verandah
openings.description: Provides outdoor space for relaxation and social interaction; oriented to maximize natural light in line with Vastu principles.

openings.name: Garage Entrance
openings.description: Serves as an entry for vehicles while maintaining a separation from the living areas to ensure security and tranquility.

openings.name: Service Entrances
openings.description: Provides access for utility services and deliveries. Designed discreetly away from main living spaces.
